title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.18 - Windshields
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1152.18 - Windshields

State Regulations

The windshields and/or windows of an automotive vehicle or
piece of mobile equipment owned or operated by the authority, its tenants and
concessionaires shall be free of cracks, blisters, discoloration or any defect
causing distortion or obstruction of the vision of the operator
thereof. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1152.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
